AVR Software Framework Installation

Copyright © 2010 Atmel Corporation


This section details the installation of the AVR software framework.


This version is not included into AVR32 Studio. Only the UC3 Software Framework v1.7.0 source code is included in AVR32 Studio 2.6 and later.

Standalone Installation

Go to asf.atmel.no and download the source archive.

AVR32 Studio

Download the complete ASF source code and see here to use the ASF 2 in AVR32 Studio.

AVR UC3 Header Files Patch

IAR EWAVR32 v3.3x Header Files Patch Installation

The avr32-headers.zip file contains a patch for the IAR EWAVR32 v3.3x release.


To apply the patch, unzip the avr32-headers.zip file in the IAR EWAVR32 installation folder under "IAR installation folder"\Embedded Workbench x.y\avr32\inc or in the GNU Toolchain installation folder under C:\Program Files\Atmel\AVR Tools\AVR32 Toolchain\avr32\include\avr32 (default location).

FAQ

In the FAQ page, you will find a list of Frequently Asked Questions related to the Software Framework.
